name.baseName: Cigarette manufacturing ; Cigarette Rolling ; Bituminous leaves, tobacco stalks, aromatic sugar materials, flakes ; Filament, coiling package, molding process; NESPS2
卷烟制造 ; 卷烟 ; 烟叶、烟梗、香糖料、薄片 ; 制丝、卷接包、成型工艺 ; 小于100万箱/年 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = actual operating hours of environmental protection facilities (hours) / hours that environmental protection facilities should operate (hours)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = actual operating hours of environmental protection facilities (hours) / hours that environmental protection facilities should operate (hours)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该工业过程涉及卷烟制造，包括使用烟叶、烟梗、香料成分和烟草薄片的制作。过程包括生丝生产、卷制、包装和成型，年产量在一百万箱以下。专门的污染控制技术如膜生物反应器（MBR）、A/O过程、生物接触氧化过程、袋式过滤器和旋风除尘器被用于处理末端排放中的污染物，如氨氮、化学需氧量（COD）和颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10），旨在减少制造过程的环境影响。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码16,三级代码162.0,四级代码1620文件，在完整版文件中第148页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisMBR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management87.8，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = actual operating hours of environmental protection facilities (hours) / hours that environmental protection facilities should operate (hours)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是MBR类，其效率为87.8，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisA/O process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85.5，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = actual operating hours of environmental protection facilities (hours) / hours that environmental protection facilities should operate (hours)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是A/O工艺，其效率为85.5，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisBio-contact oxidation process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85.5，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = actual operating hours of environmental protection facilities (hours) / hours that environmental protection facilities should operate (hours)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是生物接触氧化法，其效率为85.5，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisMBR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management92.8
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是MBR类，其效率为92.8，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.2
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为98.2，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施实际运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isCyclone dust removal + bag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.2
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是旋风+布袋，其效率为98.2，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施实际运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisA/O process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management82.4
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是A/O工艺，其效率为82.4，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisBio-contact oxidation process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management82.4
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是生物接触氧化法，其效率为82.4，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered
污染物指标废水量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
